verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> of them rods <S%H4294><s%>, one for each fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%>, of all their princes <S%H5387><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> rods <S%H4294><s%>: write <S%H3789><s%> thou every man <S%H376><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> upon his rod <S%H4294><s%>.

And thou shalt write <S%H3789><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> upon the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>; for there shall be one <S%H259><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%> for each head <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>.
And thou shalt lay them up <S%H3240><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, where I meet with you <S%H3259><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H4294><s%>, that the rod of the man <S%H376><s%> whom I shall choose <S%H977><s%> shall bud <S%H6524><s%>: and I will make to cease <S%H7918><s%> from me the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they murmur against you <S%H3885><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and all their princes <S%H5387><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him rods <S%H4294><s%>, for each prince <S%H5387><s%> one <S%H259><s%>, according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, even twelve <S%H6240><s%> rods <S%H4294><s%>: and the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> was among <S%H8432><s%> their rods <S%H4294><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> laid up <S%H3240><s%> the rods <S%H4294><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>.

And it came to pass on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, that Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>; and <S%H4294><s%>, behold, the rod of Aaron <S%H175><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> was budded <S%H6524><s%>, and put forth <S%H3318><s%> buds <S%H6525><s%>, and produced <S%H6692><s%> blossoms <S%H6731><s%>, and bare <S%H1580><s%> ripe almonds <S%H8247><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought out <S%H3318><s%> all the rods <S%H4294><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and they looked <S%H7200><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Put <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for a token <S%H226><s%> against the children of rebellion <S%H4805><s%>; that thou mayest make an end <S%H3615><s%> of their murmurings <S%H8519><s%> against me <S%H4191><s%>, that they die not.
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>: as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H6213><s%>, so did he.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1478><s%>, we perish, we are undone <S%H6><s%>, we are all undone <S%H6><s%>.
Every one that cometh near <S%H7131><s%>, that cometh near unto the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, dieth <S%H4191><s%>: shall we perish <S%H8552><s%> all of us <S%H1478><s%>?
